pages.rooms: Explore Our Luxurious Accommodations | HotelWin About Our rooms Our playing place To book Discover Our Rooms We take pride in presenting our luxurious accommodations, each promising you an unforgettable stay. Whether you're here for a romantic getaway, a business trip, or a family vacation, we have the perfect space for you. To book Our Exclusive Room Selection 1. Celestial Retreat Elevate your stay to new heights of luxury in our Celestial Retreat Suite. This lavish oasis features panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows offering breathtaking views of the city skyline. Unwind in the spacious living area, pamper yourself in the marble-clad bathroom with a rejuvenating rain shower and deluxe bath amenities, and Complimentary access to the VIP lounge In-room private bar with premium beverages Personalized butler service available 24/7 2. Ethereal Escape Experience pure indulgence in our Ethereal Escape Suite. This enchanting sanctuary combines timeless elegance with modern comforts to create a truly unforgettable stay. Relax in the spacious living area, savor gourmet delights prepared in the fully equipped kitchenette, and retreat to the opulent bedroom adorned with plush furnishings and designer accents. Unwind in the luxurious bathroom featuring a glass-enclosed rainfall shower and luxurious bath amenities. Complimentary Wi-Fi access and premium entertainment options Complimentary welcome champagne upon arrival Exclusive access to our VIP lounge with complimentary refreshments 3.Serene Skyline mmerse yourself in tranquility and elegance in our Serene Skyline Suite. With its contemporary design and soothing color palette, this suite offers a serene retreat from the bustling city below. Enjoy expansive views of the skyline from your private balcony, indulge in a peaceful night's sleep in the plush king-size bed, and rejuvenate your senses in the luxurious spa-inspired bathroom with a deep soaking tub and premium bath products. Daily gourmet breakfast served in the privacy of your suite Evening turndown service with artisanal chocolates Priority booking for hotel amenities and dining experiences 4. Tranquil Terrace Bask in the ultimate luxury of our Tranquil Terrace Suite. This extraordinary retreat boasts a private terrace overlooking the city, where you can unwind with a glass of champagne as you soak in the stunning views. Inside, discover a harmonious blend of comfort and sophistication, with a spacious living area, separate bedroom with a king-size bed, and a lavish bathroom complete with a deep soaking tub, walk-in rain shower, and premium bath products. Daily gourmet breakfast served in the privacy of your suite Evening turndown service with artisanal chocolates Priority booking for hotel amenities and dining experiences To BOOK Booking Your Stay Experience the ease and convenience of reserving your dream getaway at Heavenly Place. From selecting the perfect room type to arranging special amenities, we are committed to making your booking experience seamless and stress-free. Signature Room Styles At Heavenly Place, we pride ourselves on offering a diverse range of room styles, each exuding its own unique charm and elegance. From sleek contemporary designs to timeless classics, our rooms are thoughtfully curated to cater to every taste and preference. Whether you prefer the understated luxury of our modern suites or the timeless elegance of our traditional rooms, each space is meticulously designed to provide the utmost comfort and relaxation. Exceptional Service & Impeccable Room Care At DoubleHot Casino & Hotel, we believe that exceptional dining should be available anytime, anywhere. Impeccable Room Care: Your comfort and satisfaction are our top priorities, which is why we take great care in maintaining the cleanliness and quality of our accommodations.
